short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) for the services of Six (6) Intermediate Procurement Specialists and One (1) Intermediate Project Manager under Stream 3, Project management services. The intent of this solicitation is to establish up to seven (7) Contracts each for one (1) initial year, with the option to extend the term of the Contract by up to four (4) one-year irrevocable option periods under the same conditions.
description: NPP W8486-259668/B - Six (6) Intermediate Procurement Specialists and One (1) Intermediate Project Manager
full_summary:
### **Tender Announcement: Intermediate Procurement Specialists and Project Manager Services**

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

**File Number:** W8486-259668/B
**Tier:** 2 (> $3.75 million)

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the services of Six (6) Intermediate Procurement Specialists and One (1) Intermediate Project Manager under Stream 3, Project management services. This solicitation is for the establishment of up to seven (7) contracts, each for an initial one-year term, with the option to extend for up to four (4) one-year irrevocable option periods.

**Background and Scope:**

This requirement is part of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS. Bidders must provide the required information as detailed in Article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives.

**Eligibility:**

This solicitation is open to the following pre-qualified suppliers:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* 7792395 Canada Inc.
* 9149481 Canada Inc.
* 9468269 Canada Corp.
* A Hundred Answers Inc.
* Accenture Inc.
* ...

**Security Requirements:**

NATO SECRET security clearance is required for the supplier. Security level for document safeguarding is not applicable. Citizen restriction is also not applicable.

**Location of Work:**

The work will be located in the National Capital Region, specifically at 45 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 1C6.

**Bidders' Inquiries:**

Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority:

Name: Iain FitzGerald
Email: iain.fitzgerald@forces.gc.ca

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Submission Requirements:**

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically. The documents will be sent directly to the qualified suppliers by the Contracting Authority. The RFP documents will not be available on the CanadaBuys Tender Management Application (https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Tender Closing Date:**

2024-05-14T14:00:00

This is a competitive solicitation under the Supplier Selection Far procurement method, with a low price as the selection criterion. The proposed contract will be awarded
